column1: '''Benedict Cumberbatch''' is a British actor who portrayed the dragon [[Smaug]] and the [[Sauron
column3: ''The Hobbit (film series)'']] using motion capture as well as his voice .<ref name="THCumberbatch">{{webcite
column9: accessed=12-May-2012}}</ref> Cumberbatch stars with [[Martin Freeman]] in the BBC TV series [[Wikipedia:Sherlock (TV series)

column1: * [[2013]] - '''[http://www.bafta.org/los-angeles/britannia-awards Britannia Award]''', British Artist of the Year, ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''
* [[2014]] - '''[http://www.behindthevoiceactors.com/ Behind the Voice Actors Awards]''', Best Male Lead Vocal Performance in a Feature Film, ''The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug''
* 2014 - '''Behind the Voice Actors Awards''', Breakthrough Voice Actor of the Year.
